content.title: Intro
content.content:
2013
Preceded by
2013
2014
Year
2015
Followed by
2015

Tolkien-related events that took place in 2014.

content.title: January
content.content:
3 - Birthday Toast.
3 - Saul Zaentz dies.
30 - Director Arthur Rankin, Jr. dies.
? - Amon Hen 245 is published.

content.title: February
content.content:
27 - The Fall of Arthur is published in paperback.
27 - Farmer Giles of Ham pocket edition is published.

content.title: March
content.content:
25 - Anglo-Saxon Community in J.R.R. Tolkien's the Lord of the Rings is published.
25 - Tolkien Reading Day.
? - Amon Hen 246 is published.

content.title: April
content.content:
3 - Smaug: Unleashing the Dragon is published.
5 - Words of Westernesse: Adûnaic and Westron is published.
5 - The Moon in The Hobbit is published.
5 - The indigenous peoples of Eriador and Gondor is published.
7 - The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug is released on Blu-ray and DVD in the UK.
8 - The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug is released on Blu-ray and DVD in the USA.
19 - 21 - Hobbitcon 2.
24 - Peter Jackson announces that the third Hobbit film will be renamed to The Battle of the Five Armies.
30 - Hither Shore 10 is published.

content.title: May
content.content:
22 - Beowulf: A Translation and Commentary by J.R.R. Tolkien, edited by Christopher Tolkien, is published.
24 - Beowulf Launch Party hosted by The Tolkien Society and Middle-earth Network with support from Tolkien Brasil and The Tolkienist.
28 - Middle-Earth in Magic Mirror Maps is published.
30 - Tolkien in the New Century: Essays in Honor of Tom Shippey is published.
? - A Companion to J. R. R. Tolkien is published.
? - Amon Hen 247 is published.

content.title: June
content.content:
6 - The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug: Chronicles: Cloaks & Daggers is published.
15 - Voice actor Casey Kasem dies.
19 - A new 60th Anniversary Edition of The Lord of the Rings is published.
19 - An updated edition of The Lord of the Rings: A Reader's Companion is published.

content.title: July
content.content:
18 - 20 - Tolkien Thing 2014.
26 - Laocoon, one of Tolkien's favourite trees, lost two limbs. Subsequently, the Oxford Botanic Garden decided that the tree must be felled for safety reasons.
29 - Producer and interviewer Denys Gueroult dies.

content.title: August
content.content:
8 - 11 - Mythcon 45 in Wheaton College, Norton.
14 - The Tolkien Society Seminar as part of WorldCon, London.
14 - Tolkien On Fairy-stories is published in paperback.
28 - Tolkien Calendar 2015 is published.
? - Amon Hen 248 is published.

content.title: September
content.content:
11 - The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies: Annual 2015 is published.
11 - 14 - Oxonmoot 2014 at Lady Margaret Hall.
12 - Tolkien at Exeter College: How an Oxford undergraduate created Middle-earth by John Garth is published.
30 - Middle-earth: Shadow of Mordor is released in North America.
? - Amon Hen 249 is published.

content.title: October
content.content:
3 - Middle-earth: Shadow of Mordor is released in Europe.
9 - The Adventures of Tom Bombadil pocket edition is published.
13 - Journal of Inklings Studies, vol.4 no.2, including a translation of Tolkien's The Book of Jonah, is published.
21 - The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug - Extended Edition is released for digital download.
23 - Writer and actor Bernard Mayes dies.
30 - The Hobbit and Tolkien's Mythology is published.
30 - Arda Inhabited is published.

content.title: November
content.content:
3 - The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug Extended Edition is released on Blu-ray and DVD in the UK.
4 - The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug Extended Edition is released on Blu-ray and DVD in the USA.
11 - The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies: Activity Book is published.
15 - War of Words: Soldier-Poets of the Somme is aired.
15 - ArdaCraft begins building Middle-earth.
20 - The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies: The Movie Storybook is published.
20 - The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies: Official Movie Guide is published.
20 - The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies: Visual Companion is published.
20 - The Hobbit Trilogy Location Guide is published.
30 - Tolkien's Great War (documentary) by Zander and Elliot Weaver is released.
? - Amon Hen 250 is published.
? - Mallorn 55 is published.

content.title: December
content.content:
1 - The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies premières in Leicester Square, London.
4 - JRR Tolkien, le seigneur des écrivains (La Grande Librairie) is aired.
5 - Middle-earth: Shadow of Mordor wins one Game Award, out of three nominations, at the 2014 The Game Awards.
8 - The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies - Original Motion Picture Soundtrack - Special Edition is released.
11 - The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies is released in New Zealand.
12 - The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies is released in the United Kingdom.
17 - The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies is released in the United States.
17 - The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies: Chronicles: Art & Design is published.
Years
2011 2012 2013 2014 2015 2016 2017
